```{r}
area <- PCTs %>% group_by(PCTID) %>%
  summarise(total_area = sum(Shape_Area))
# plot barplot where x = PCTName, y = total_area
ggplot(area, aes(x = as.factor(PCTID), y = total_area)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))
```
